Articles.Content:
Is there a way to mark KSC on the map/globe to help me judge my landing? I forget where it is.

Edited January 27, 2015 by THX1138

Plant a flag.

When I was routinely Spaceplaning, I'd plant a flag at the east and west ends of the runway, and Target whichever one was closer to help me find the runway.
Look for "Africa" it's on the east side of it.

Alternatively, you could use a mod like RemoteTech or KerbalKonstructs, which have UI marks at the KSC (connection dot for RT, base icons for KK).

Flags are probably the easiest.
And prior to unlicking flags, jump a small craft from the pad to somewhere on the lawn. Recover it later for cash.

Look for "Africa" it's on the east side of it.

This is what I do. KSC is located on a little roughly square-shaped prominence right on the equator.

It helps to launch into a perfectly equatorial orbit also. Then all you've got to do is time your descent when you're almost to it.
